stable.name: Change Display Brightness
stable.author: t1m0thyj
stable.description: Changes brightness of primary display based on the time of day, using values that can be customized in the script.
stable.info: Requires hardware that supports DDC/CI (the ability to change display brightness in Windows).

stable.name: Change Windows App Theme
stable.author: t1m0thyj
stable.description: Changes Windows 10 app theme (used by Store apps) based on the time of day.

stable.name: Change Windows System Theme
stable.author: t1m0thyj
stable.description: Changes Windows 10 system theme (used by taskbar and Start menu) based on the time of day.

experimental.name: Change Lockscreen Image
experimental.author: t1m0thyj
experimental.description: Changes lockscreen image dynamically to match desktop wallpaper.
experimental.warning: Changing the image does not work consistently. (MSDN)
experimental.info: Requires that the "Background" option is set to "Picture" in the Windows 10 lockscreen settings.

experimental.name: Change Microsoft Edge Theme
experimental.author: t1m0thyj
experimental.description: Changes Microsoft Edge theme based on the time of day.
experimental.warning: Changing the theme does not update it in Edge immediately, restarting the browser is required for the change to take effect.
